name: Tank Trucks Transport Top Secret Artilllery Transporter Mission Games
name_original: Tank Trucks Transport Top Secret Artilllery Transporter Mission Games
description:
As a Transporter in the Army you are assigned to operate some of the most advanced transport machinery and vehicles in the world. You are a soldier who operates and manages Army vehicles in combat, combat support and combat service support roles, by day and by night, on all forms of roads as required, carrying a variety of loads including cargo, personnel and dangerous goods, Battle Tank and the Warrior Infantry Fighting Vehicle, 4WDs, and helicopter. Transport & deliver the required personnel, stores and equipment, Combat Service Support to the army camp. Upgrade big trucks to ease the transport. Don’t rush or smash your vehicle otherwise you will crash. Be a Brave Soldier!!

GAME FEATURES:-

1. 100% addictive gameplay.
2. Unlock & UPGRADE new army trucks to play.
3. NEW theme & realistic physics to control.
4. Amazing truck simulation features.
5. Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views.
6. Smooth game flow & controls of racing simulator.
7. Explore different worlds & achieve new objectives & missions.

How to Play:-

-Tap your iPhone/iPad on your right side to race, brake and control the speed.
-Tap on right side upper lever to control the gears.
-Move the steering to control the truck.
